title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.13 - Procedure prescribed for commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.13 - Procedure prescribed for commission

State Regulations

When suspension or revocation proceedings are begun
before the commission it shall dispose of the proceeding in the same manner as
in the case of an appeal from a determination or action of the municipal
governing body. Both the licensee and the governing body issuing the license
shall be notified immediately in writing of the decision and in the event of a
suspension or revocation, the effective date thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4830.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
